article_title: U.S. Recoups Funds From States That Faltered on Health Exchanges
article_text:
WASHINGTON—The Obama administration on Tuesday said it has recouped more than $200 million in funding given to states that faltered in setting up their own health-insurance exchanges.

Government officials are seeking to collect more of the original grant funding, an effort that they said shows they are closely monitoring taxpayer dollars that state-run exchanges received under the Affordable Care Act.

“CMS is working hard for...
